errors.error_description: Lists manual dependency installation when these are automatically handled by pip install twine
correction_candidates: Remove the Dependencies section as pip install twine handles all dependencies automatically
Replace with: Install twine and all dependencies with: pip install twine
Change to: Use pip install twine[all] to install with optional dependencies
Modify to: Install development dependencies with: pip install twine[dev]
errors.golden_answer: Remove the Dependencies section as pip install twine handles all dependencies automatically
